$WmMPID_フラヴィア,ch04_46_Flavia_F_Normal,Face|I now sit upon the throne! Our course
is my decision! Even so, I value your
counsel, if you have any to offer...$k$p$WmMPID_バジーリオ,ch04_47_Basiglio_M_Normal,Face|While the throne is yours, there's
a little war that needs finishing
before you can take your seat!$k$p$Sbs1000|
